name: Venkata Nikhil Nandyala
title: Cloud Solutions Architect
about: Experienced Azure Architect with 8+ years designing secure, scalable cloud infrastructures. Passionate about automation, networking, and DevOps excellence.

experience.title: Lead Azure Solutions Architect
highlights: Designed hub-and-spoke network architecture across 20+ subscriptions with automated guardrails.
Migrated legacy workloads to Azure Kubernetes Service with enterprise App Gateway routing.
Standardized Terraform modules and CI/CD pipelines to shrink provisioning time from weeks to hours.

experience.title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
highlights: Implemented Azure landing zones with policy-driven governance and cost controls.
Automated load balancer upgrades with PowerShell runbooks to eliminate maintenance downtime.
Built observability dashboards combining Azure Monitor and Log Analytics for proactive support.

education.details: Focus on distributed systems, cloud-native patterns, and secure network design.
Graduated with distinction; led the campus cloud lab initiative.

projects.title: SPY Options Predictor
projects.description: Built an ML model using XGBoost and LSTM deployed in Azure Kubernetes Service. Predicts SPY drops with >85% accuracy.

projects.title: Azure Inventory Dashboard
projects.description: Full-stack app that pulls all services from 20+ subscriptions and renders network architecture diagrams per subscription.

projects.title: Load Balancer Upgrade Automation
projects.description: Scripted upgrade of Basic to Standard SKU LBs using PowerShell across production regions, reducing downtime risk to zero.

testimonials.quote: Nikhil is one of the most reliable Azure architects I’ve worked with. His ability to quickly troubleshoot and redesign network flows saved our team weeks of effort.
testimonials.author: Senior DevOps Engineer, Calpine

testimonials.quote: Venkata’s automation-first mindset transformed our deployment process. His PowerShell scripts and Terraform blueprints are now the standard for our cloud infrastructure.
testimonials.author: Cloud Operations Manager, XYZ Solutions
